q: minivans' future WINDSOR, Ontario: Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' But as Eric Schmidt put it in a Twitter posting on Thursday( Jan. 20), day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Instead, Eric Schmidt will take on the role of Google's executive chairman, where he says he will focus on broader business partnerships, technology leadership, product development and government outreach. At a dinner this week, attended by`` The Daily Telegraph'', with conservatives in New York, Donald Rumsfeld elicited murmurs of approval when he suggested that Barack Obama 's troop-heavy strategy in Afghanistan was flawed. I personally did not think we needed to make a career out of Afghanistan, he said.`` The Soviets were in there with hundreds of thousands of troops for 12 years and lost. It's a landlocked country, it went through occupation, civil war, drought, hostile neighbours.
